policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="* Policy runs successfully with a routing assertion."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="GET"/>
            <L7p:OmitAuthHeaderConnectReuseSystemDefault boxedBooleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="https://localhost:8443/echotest"/>
            <L7p:ProxyPassword stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:ProxyUsername stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="* Policy fails with a policy violation."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
            <L7p:Content stringValue="Policy Violation"/>
            <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
        </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="* Policy fails with a routing failure."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
            <L7p:Content stringValue="Routing Failure"/>
            <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
        </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="GET"/>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://unknowhostfoobarxyz/foo/bar"/>
            <L7p:ProxyPassword stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:ProxyUsername stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="* Policy runs successfully without a routing assertion."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="********************************************************************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dGhpcyBpcyBhIHRlc3Q="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="test"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="UG9saWN5IFN1Y2Nlc3NmdWwuIE5vIHJvdXRpbmc="/>
            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="text/plain; charset=UTF-8"/>
        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="request.http.parameter.dob"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetOutputVariablePrefix stringValue="dobin"/>
                </L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkb2Jpbi5vdXRwdXR9"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dob"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Set default date format"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5LnRpbWUuZGQvTU0veXl5eX0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dob"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="DOB"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="request.http.parameter.format"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetOutputVariablePrefix stringValue="formatin"/>
                </L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtmb3JtYXRpbi5vdXRwdXR9"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dob_format"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="//Set default"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ZGQvTU0veXl5eQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dob_format"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="DOB-format"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="DoB string to date"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkb2J9"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="dateTime"/>
            <L7p:DateFormat stringValue="${dob_format}"/>
            <L7p:DateOffsetExpression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:DateOffsetField intValue="12"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dob_date"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="30a4d269-4e43-45eb-ba40-592c1bd0816d"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="GetSystemDate"/>
        </L7p:Encapsulated>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="System date/time to seconds"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtjdXJyZW50RGF0ZS5zZWNvbmRzfQ=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="currentDateInSeconds"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="DoB to seconds"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkb2JfZGF0ZS5zZWNvbmRzfQ=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dobInSeconds"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:JavaScript>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Calculate Age in years"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Name stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var now = context.getVariable('currentDateInSeconds');
var dob = context.getVariable('dob_date.seconds');
context.setVariable('diff', Math.floor((now - dob) / 31536000));]]></L7p:Script>
        </L7p:JavaScript>
        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="ewogICJkYXRlT2ZCaXJ0aCIgOiAiJHtkb2JfZGF0ZS5kZC9NTU0veXl5eX0iLAogICJhZ2UiIDogIiR7ZGlmZn0iLAp9"/>
            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="GET"/>
            <L7p:OmitAuthHeaderConnectReuseSystemDefault boxedBooleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="https://localhost:8443/echotest"/>
            <L7p:ProxyPassword stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:ProxyUsername stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.date"/>
            <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="date"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.foramt"/>
            <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="format"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkYXRlLnJlc3VsdH0="/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="dateTime"/>
            <L7p:DateFormat stringValue="${format.result}"/>
            <L7p:DateOffsetExpression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="currentDate"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
